name: Obese Geese
description:
Obese Geese is a little party game inspired by that old neon-green helicopter game where you have to fly through the cave, and a hidden gem called Astro Pods from the minigame pack 20 Games To Play With Your Mates. You can either play single player and see how far you can make it into the cave, or play with friends and try to knock them into the walls to get them killed (just like a real goose!)

Originally made in 2018 in Gamemaker Studio 2 for my high school code club and never officially released until now. Have fun!
